abstract: Spotify saw its revenue more than quintuple last year, but the company says it still lost more than $40 million.
snippet: Spotify saw its revenue more than quintuple last year, but the company says it still lost more than $40 million.
lead_paragraph: Spotify, the streaming digital music service that was just given a big boost through a partnership with Facebook, saw its revenue more than quintuple last year, but the company still lost more than $40 million, it reported on Monday.

headline.main: Spotify Loss Widens Despite Higher Revenue
